review: I don't usually write product reviews but I've been telling all my friends to buy one of these. As an owner of a Apple TV 2, Chromecast, and OUYA, and previous owner of other cheap Android streaming devices, I can say that this little stick is well worth the money. It's fast and easy to use. The Fire TV Android app is well written and works with the Fire Stick very well. The keyboard function recognizes my input and displays to the TV fast (big plus over the competition).My only complaint is not allowing sideloaded apps to display in the main app tray. The device is written on Android, so why make us jump through hoops to use Android apps?
